javabikes

Class ElectricBike

  • java.lang.Object
    • javabikes.Bike
      • javabikes.ElectricBike

  • public class ElectricBike
extends Bike
    Represents an ElectricBike in the JavaBikes' catalog. The ElectricBike class inherits all its fields from the Bike class, and adds some battery-related informations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int battery
      Battery level, in percentage, of the bike.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElectricBike(int newId, java.lang.String newColor, java.lang.String newBikeType, int newPrice, java.lang.Boolean newIsAvailable, int bikeBattery)
      Contructor of the ElectricBike object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBatteryLevel()
      Getter method, it gives back the bike's battery level.
      int getKmRange()
      Custom getter, it gives back the bike's range, in km.

      • Methods inherited from class javabikes.Bike

        getBikeId, getBikeType, getBikeTypeString, getColor, getIsAvailable, getPrice

    • Field Detail

      • battery

        private int battery
        Battery level, in percentage, of the bike.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElectricBike

        public ElectricBike(int newId,
                    java.lang.String newColor,
                    java.lang.String newBikeType,
                    int newPrice,
                    java.lang.Boolean newIsAvailable,
                    int bikeBattery)
        Contructor of the ElectricBike object. This object inherits all the Bike parameters and methods, and then it adds some.
        Parameters:
        newId - Identification number of the bike.
        newColor - Bike's color.
        newBikeType - Bike's type. A bike can be either for men, women or kids.
        newPrice - Price of the bike.
        newIsAvailable - It must be true or false. If it is true, the bike is in the database and it is available, otherwise if false the bike is in the database but it's booked by someone else.
        bikeBattery - Integer number, its value is the percentage charge of the bike's battery

    • Method Detail

      • getBatteryLevel

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        Getter method, it gives back the bike's battery level.
        Returns:
        integer number, equal to the bike battery level.

      • getKmRange

        public int getKmRange()
        Custom getter, it gives back the bike's range, in km. More testing has to be done to establish the mathematical relationship between the battery level (expressed as a percentage) and the bike's range. At the moment, it seems that an increase of 2% in the battery level adds 1 kilometer to the bike' range.
        Returns:
        integer number, equal to the bike's range in kilometres.
